channel.title: Review on 0x23b's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Review on 0x23b's blog

item.title: OSCP Review
item.description: An amazing journey comes to an end After a year of preparing, two months of lab access with over 300 hours of study it is now official: I’am an Offensive Security Certified Professional (OSCP)! But what does that mean and how was my journey? It took me about three months, to get my things together and write this blog post. Hopefully, while telling you about my journey I can provide you some information, that will help you preparing for OSCP.
